text: Zinj may refer to: *Paranthropus boisei, nicknamed "Zinj" for its former name Zinjanthropus boisei *Zinj, Bahrain, a suburb of Manama, Bahrain *Zinj, alternate spelling of Zanj, a medieval area of the East African coast *Zinj - name of the fictional lost city in Michael Crichton's 1979 novel Congo, and its 1995 film adaptation
title: Zinj
